senses.sense_definition: A prophet in the Hebrew Bible who was the disciple and successor of Elijah.

examples.text: The prophet <w>Elisha</w> performed many miracles throughout his life.
In the scriptures, Elijah passed his mantle to <w>Elisha</w>.

senses.sense_definition: A male given name of Hebrew origin.

examples.text: My uncle <w>Elisha</w> is known for his quiet and thoughtful nature.
<w>Elisha</w> Otis was the inventor of the safety elevator.

senses.sense_definition: A female given name, sometimes used as a variant of Alicia or Elizabeth.

examples.text: The actress <w>Elisha</w> Cuthbert has appeared in many popular films.
She named her daughter <w>Elisha</w> because she loved the sound of it.
